Class Friend

java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

Class that represents a Live Journal Friend.

getBirthday

public java.util.Date getBirthday()
The friend's birthday. Note that this is only returned if the user has set their info to visible and if they have set a birthday, otherwise this key is skipped. You will also need to set includebdays to 1 when you make the request in order to receive this field

Returns:
birthday

getGroupMask

public java.util.BitSet getGroupMask()
If the group mask is not "1" (just bit 0 set), then this variable is returned with an 32-bit unsigned integer with a bit 0 always set, and bits 1-30 set for each group this friend is a part of. Bit 31 is reserved.

Returns:
The group mask BitSet

setGroupMask

public void setGroupMask(java.util.BitSet groupMask)
Sets the group mask for this friend

Parameters:
groupMask -

setGroupMask

public void setGroupMask(java.lang.String groupMask)
Helper setter to convert String of 1's & 0's to BitSet

Parameters:
groupMask -

getAccountType

public AccountType getAccountType()
The account type of this friend, if it's not a personal account. Currently the only possible values are "community" and "syndicated", which means you're monitoring this community/syndicated feed on your friends list. (Note that it does not imply that you're a member of the community if the type is community, just that you monitor it.)

Returns:
accountType

setAccountType

public void setAccountType(AccountType accountType)
Sets the accountType for this friend

Parameters:
accountType -

setAccountType

public void setAccountType(java.lang.String accountType)
Helper setter to convert String to AccountType

Parameters:
accountType -

getAccountStatus

public AccountStatus getAccountStatus()
The status of this user. If this field is absent, the user has a normal active account. Otherwise the currently possible values for this field are "deleted", "suspended" and "purged"

Returns:
accountStatus

setAccountStatus

public void setAccountStatus(AccountStatus accountStatus)
Sets the accountStatus for this friend
